title: About
text:
Hi! I’m Jasmine, the developer of lyriguessr. I study Statistics and Data Science at UT Austin, and love working on fun projects such as lyriguessr in my free time.

Business inquiries: contact me at lyriguessr@gmail.com!

The idea of lyriguessr all started with tayLyrics, the Taylor Swift-themed game I initially created for myself and my roommate Hannah during my freshman year. We’re both Swifties and are avid tayLyrics players - try to beat us on the leaderboard!
I realized that tayLyrics could be generalized to fans of any artist - why not share the fun with everyone, right? So, here’s my little contribution to the music lovers of the world. Enjoy!

My favorite artists are Waterparks, Bad Omens, and Taylor Swift.

title: Waterparks
text:
Play the game!




Go to waterparksGuessr




Details






Announcement



I am taking requests for cooler/punnier names for Waterparks’ game! Tweet me your ideas on Twitter @lyriguessr!


Lyrics range from Airplane Conversations to INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY.
Demo album 1 is not included, and neither are Candy and What We Do For Fun.


The Dataset and Statistics
There are 4,449 lines in the waterparksGuessr dataset, with 2,577 of them being unique lines.

You have around a 0.022% chance of getting each line (not factoring in repeated lyrics) in Hard mode!
Notable single lines that show up in high frequencies:

title: Radiohead
text:
Play the game!




Go to radioheadGuessr




Details






Announcement



I am taking requests for cooler/punnier names for Radiohead’s game! Tweet me your ideas on Twitter @lyriguessr!


Lyrics range from Pablo Honey to A Moon Shaped Pool.
As of now, In Rainbows (Disk 2) is not included.

title: Taylor Swift
text:
Play the game!




Go to tayLyrics




Details
Lyrics range from debut to THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT.
Hits Different, You’re Losing Me, and All of the Girls You Loved Before are included.

title: Welcome to lyriguessr!
text:
⚔️ The Game
The gist of lyriguessr: earn as many points as possible by guessing the song that the generated lyric(s) comes from. The higher the difficulty level, the more points you get.


Easy correct guess: +1
Medium correct guess: +3
Hard correct guess: +5


If you don’t have a guess, you can ask for a hint - there are three hints available for each generated lyric. Or, you could also choose to give up and move on to the next round. But keep in mind that getting hints and giving up will cost you points!


Hint (each): -1
Giving up: -2




🎵 Artists

Interact with me at @lyriguessr on Twitter to request new artists!
